modName: Live Like a Thane - A Better Breezehome
summary: Finally! You can live like a Thane should, in a home without cobwebs and crates scattered about. Many objects have been swapped out for their Noble Tier counterparts. Breezehome was meant to be beautiful, so make it that way. If you like this mod, feel free to give it a good rating, or better yet, add it to your favorites.
descriptionHtml:
Hello! Please contact me immediately with any bugs that you find. If you are an experienced modder unlike myself and can offer your expertise in order to resolve bugs, please contact me. Report all bugs in the discussion or comments section. Otherwise, enjoy!

[b]Features:[/b]
 - All "Noble" furniture and containers
 - Blue paint walls replaced by white plaster walls
 - Cobwebs, crates, (useless) clutter removed
 - Main bedroom expanded
 - Wooden floors added
 - 2nd level floors added
 - 1st level ceiling added

[b]Important Notes:
[/b] - Please move all your chest items. Because the furniture is replaced, the chest in the main bedroom will not have your old chest data.
 - This removes the option to upgrade Breezehome, please be sure that you have not upgraded the house nor intend to.

[b]Bugs/Issues:
[/b] - Upgrading Breezehome before installing will result in glitches/extra objects
 - NOT compatible with Hearthfire DLC (disabling Hearthfire will be fine)
 - On occasion, the home will load without any floor, as if the house itself if not loaded

[b]Whats New:[/b]
v1.1
 - Improved Interior lighting
 - Replaced corner table that was not in theme
 - Added tablecloth
 - Added firewood inside and outside
author: Meekle13
